title: Left-Facing Fist

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: A fist pointing left, which may be used in conjunction with the right-facing fist to complete a fist-bump gesture.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the left-facing fist emoji is a robust symbol of solidarity and empowerment, rendered with bold, defined lines and subtle shading that gives it a strong, tactile presence.  The smooth, rounded knuckles and the slight sheen from Apple's realistic lighting contribute to its impactful, three-dimensional look.  This emoji, with its confident posture, is frequently used to express support, agreement, a show of strength, or as a sign of unity in digital conversations.
